meanings.definition: The profession or occupation of a librarian.
meanings.sent1: Librarianship requires a love for books and helping people.
meanings.sent2: She studied librarianship in college and now works at the local library.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to learn librarianship to organize its toy mice collection.
meanings.sent4: In the kingdom of knowledge, librarianship is the noblest of professions.
meanings.sent5: The magic of librarianship lies in connecting readers with the perfect book.

meanings.definition: The skill or practice of managing a library.
meanings.sent1: Effective librarianship involves cataloging and shelving books efficiently.
meanings.sent2: Librarianship requires attention to detail and organizational abilities.
meanings.sent3: The penguin demonstrated excellent librarianship by arranging fish by size.
meanings.sent4: Her librarianship was like a well-conducted symphony, each book finding its place.
meanings.sent5: The art of librarianship transforms a room of books into a sanctuary of knowledge.
